content:
I've added the new shows to your list:

**Ozark (Netflix)**

* Currently watching: Season 4
* Last episode watched: Episode 7 (out of 14 episodes in Season 4)

**Hawkeye (Disney+)**

* Status: Completed

**The Mandalorian (Disney+)**

* Currently watching: Season 2
* Last episode watched: Episode 5

**The Grand Tour (Amazon Prime Video)**

* Currently watching
* Last episode watched: Episode 3

**The Office (Peacock)**

* Currently watching: Season 5

Let me know if you need to update anything else!

It's great that you're enjoying a mix of different genres and formats - from drama (Ozark) to action-adventure (The Mandalorian) to comedy (The Office) and automotive enthusiasm (The Grand Tour). Do you have a favorite episode or moment from The Office so far?
